text: Ridge is an unincorporated community in Carter County, Montana, United States. It is located approximately south of Boyes, and about east of Biddle. Its elevation is 3,970 feet. ==Geography== Ridge is a populated place located in Carter County, Montana at latitude 45.047 and longitude -105.02. Ridge appears on the Belle Creek South U.S. Geological Survey Map. Carter County is in the Mountain Time Zone (UTC -7 hours). ==Climate== According to the Köppen Climate Classification system, Ridge has a semi-arid climate, abbreviated "BSk" on climate maps.Climate Summary for Alzada, Montana ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Carter County, Montana Category:Unincorporated communities in Montana
